thread.title: Fears for missing mum, 25, who vanished with newborn baby nearly a week ago
thread.title_full: Fears for missing mum, 25, who vanished with newborn baby nearly a week ago

author: Joshua Taylor
title: Fears for missing mum, 25, who vanished with newborn baby nearly a week ago
text:
News Fears for missing mum, 25, who vanished with newborn baby nearly a week ago Sophie Callaghan and her young son Georgie haven't been seen for nearly a week and detectives are becoming increasingly concerned for their safety Share Police want anyone who has seen Sophie to get in touch (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Police are searching for a missing mum who vanished with her newborn baby nearly a week ago. 
Sophie Callaghan, 25, disappeared without a trace last Wednesday in Prescot, just outside Liverpool. 
Neither she nor her 10-week-old baby boy Georgie has been spotted since. 
Police say they are making "extensive efforts" to find Sophie and the infant. 
The mum, from Toxteth, Liverpool, is described as white, of slight build with dark brown, collar-length hair that is normally tied up in a knot. Sophie went missing with her 10-week-old son Georgie (Photo: Merseyside Police) Read More 
She often wears leggings and a denim jacket, according to Merseyside Police . 
Sophie is known to frequent the north Wales, north Cheshire and Wigan areas. 
Detectives said in a statement: "Police officers are making extensive efforts to find Sophie and return her home safely and would urge Sophie, anyone who knows her whereabouts or who has seen a woman resembling her to call police." 
Police can be reached by calling 0151 777 2014 or on the 101 non-emergency number. 
Alternatively, contact the Missing People charity by calling 116 000 or emailing 116000@missingpeople.org.uk. Like us on Facebook
